description:
Ben Chu

Engineers tasked with planning new infrastructure constantly face the problem of having to look through too much information. This talk is about how we wanted to be lazy and wrote a bot to do it for us instead.

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/python-applications-in-infrastructure-planning-and-civil-engineering

PyCon AU, the national Python Language conference, is on again this August in Sydney, at the International Convention Centre, Sydney, August 24 - 28 2018.

Video licence: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Python, PyCon, PyConAU

Sat Aug  3 13:30:00 2019 at C3.3
title: Python Applications in Infrastructure Planning and Civil Engineering
